data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Hakim Ziyech for Chelsea drives towards goal at Stamford Bridge. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 2, Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Kevin Friend.
Olivier Giroud (Chelsea) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
In the minute 4, Patrick Bamford puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Great play from Kalvin Phillips to set up the goal.
Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Leeds.
In the minute 7, Kevin Friend signals a Leeds throw-in in Chelsea's half.
Timo Werner (Chelsea) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
The match at Stamford Bridge has been interrupted briefly for a check on Robin Koch, who is down injured.
Corner awarded to Chelsea.
Timo Werner hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Chelsea!
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Chelsea in the half of Leeds.
In the minute 9, The away team has substituted Robin Koch with Diego Llorente. Marcelo Bielsa is thus making his first change.
Chelsea to take a throw-in in Leeds territory.
Free kick for Leeds in the half of Chelsea.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Leeds in their own half.
Chelsea awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kevin Friend awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 14, Jack Harrison (Leeds) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Goal kick for Chelsea at Stamford Bridge.
Throw-in high up the field for Leeds in London.
In the minute 15, Patrick Bamford for Leeds gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Kevin Friend awards Chelsea a goal kick.
Throw-in for Leeds in their own half.
In the minute 18, Can Chelsea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leeds's half?
In London Chelsea's Timo Werner is caught offside.
Leeds drive into the zone and Ezgjan Alioski is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
In the minute 19, Luke Ayling of Leeds is pulled up for offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Leeds.
In the minute 21, Free kick Chelsea.
Chelsea's Olivier Giroud gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Leeds goal kick.
In the minute 23, Leeds drive upfield and Stuart Dallas gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Chelsea defender.
Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by Kevin Friend.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Chelsea in the half of Leeds.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Leeds pushes forward through Patrick Bamford, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 27, Goal! Olivier Giroud equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Reece James.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Hakim Ziyech for Chelsea who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 30, Christian Pulisic (Chelsea) has replaced the possibly injured Hakim Ziyech at Stamford Bridge.
Chelsea have a goal kick.
Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
In the minute 33, Kevin Friend blows against Leeds's Raphinha for offside.
Kevin Friend signals a Leeds throw-in in Chelsea's half.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
In the minute 35, Can Leeds capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Chelsea's half?
Ball safe as Leeds is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Chelsea.
In the minute 39, Patrick Bamford for Leeds is whistled offside.
Throw-in for Leeds at Stamford Bridge.
Patrick Bamford (Leeds) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 42, Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Kevin Friend.
Chelsea's Benjamin Chilwell is on target but unsuccessful.
Chelsea awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 44, Leeds to take a throw-in in Chelsea territory.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Can Leeds get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chelsea's half?
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Chelsea in their own half.
Chelsea awarded a free kick in their own half.
In London Chelsea attack through Reece James. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Stamford Bridge.
In the minute 46, Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
Free kick for Leeds in their own half.
Can Chelsea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leeds's half?
In the minute 47, Kevin Friend awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Chelsea in the half of Leeds.
Kevin Friend signals a throw-in for Chelsea, close to Leeds's area.
In the minute 50, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Important block from the Leeds defence as Christian Pulisic fires in a strike for Chelsea.
Chelsea awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 52, Chelsea to take a throw-in in Leeds territory.
Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Kevin Friend.
Leeds will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Chelsea.
In the minute 54, Kai Havertz (Chelsea) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Kevin Friend awards Leeds a goal kick.
Goal kick for Leeds at Stamford Bridge.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Chelsea close to the penalty box.
Chelsea's Kai Havertz gets in a shot on goal at Stamford Bridge. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
In the minute 57, Leeds drives forward and Raphinha gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Leeds are coming forward and Raphinha gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Chelsea goal kick.
Free kick for Leeds in their own half.
In the minute 58, Marcelo Bielsa is making the team's second substitution at Stamford Bridge with Ian Poveda replacing Jack Harrison.
Throw-in Chelsea.
In the minute 60, Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Chelsea in their own half.
Timo Werner of Chelsea smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Chelsea drives forward and Timo Werner gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 61, Chelsea's Mason Mount gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Leeds defender.
Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Kevin Friend.
Kurt Zouma scores with a header and the home team now lead 2-1.
In the minute 61, Mason Mount instrumental with a fine assist.
Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kevin Friend signals a Leeds throw-in in Chelsea's half.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Chelsea in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Leeds needs to be cautious. Chelsea have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Leeds in the half of Chelsea.
Christian Pulisic (Chelsea) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Leeds at Stamford Bridge.
Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
In the minute 67, The home team have replaced Kai Havertz with Mateo Kovacic. This is the second substitution made today by Frank Lampard.
Chelsea are pushing forward but Christian Pulisic's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 68, Leeds have a goal kick.
Free kick for Leeds in their own half.
The away team replace Ezgjan Alioski with Rodrigo Moreno.
In the minute 70, Corner awarded to Leeds.
In London Chelsea drive forward through Mason Mount. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Kevin Friend signals a Leeds throw-in in Chelsea's half.
In the minute 74, In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Diego Llorente is booked for the away team.
Timo Werner of Chelsea smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 77, Corner awarded to Chelsea.
Olivier Giroud (Chelsea) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Kevin Friend awards Leeds a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Leeds pushes forward through Ian Poveda, whose finish on goal is saved.
Ball safe as Leeds is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Frank Lampard (Chelsea) is making a third substitution, with Tammy Abraham replacing Olivier Giroud.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Leeds in the half of Chelsea.
Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Kevin Friend.
In London, Reece James (Chelsea) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 81, Leeds have a goal kick.
Leeds drive forward but Ian Poveda is judged offside.
Chelsea have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 83, Chelsea to take a throw-in in Leeds territory.
In London, Christian Pulisic of Chelsea is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Can Leeds get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chelsea's half?
In the minute 84, Ball goes out of play for a Chelsea goal kick.
Kevin Friend waits before resuming play because Thiago Silva for Chelsea is still down.
Thiago Silva has recovered and rejoins the match in London.
In the minute 87, Tammy Abraham of Chelsea gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Leeds at Stamford Bridge.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
In the minute 89, Ball safe as Chelsea is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Chelsea awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Chelsea in their own half.
Kevin Friend will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Leeds at Stamford Bridge.
Kevin Friend awards the away team a throw-in.
Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Chelsea.
Kevin Friend blows to end the match. The final score is 3-1.
It's now 3-1 in London as Christian Pulisic scores for Chelsea.
Timo Werner with an assist there.
At Stamford Bridge, Raphinha has been yellow-carded for the away team.
